Message: Even though pleasure won't last forever, as long as Commandant is here, we'll surely have much more pleasure again!
It was so fun hanging around with Commandant, but I felt there weren't enough kinds of drinks. Next time, we'll handle the drinks for you. Speech input ended. Oh, Is it this button?
Commandant, after the event ends, please don't push yourself too hard and take rest days whenever you need to... Well then, I'll go to look for other members.
On behalf of the Engineering Force, we hope to see you again at the next event. I'm only speaking on behalf of the Engineering Force, okay?
It was getting noisier when people gathered around. Let's go somewhere quieter next time, just the two of us.
I'd have brought my harmonica if I'd known there would be so many events around. I'm looking forward to giving everyone my best performance next time.
With the sea waves softly rolling in and birds soaring in the sky, it couldn't be any better to create art with you.
We must hold an event like this one more time, Commandant! Let's meet up next week. I can't wait to see your event proposal! This is what Nanami wanted to tell you.
I've been told that I should wear something more appropriate for an event like this. What are your thoughts, Commandant? Or can you help me select my clothes?
It's good to have a place where you can soak your body in sea water. Thank you for bringing me here, Commandant.
Were you able to dig up this message, Commandant? This was pretty like how we dug you out of the sand. Perhaps we should just throw it into the sea next time.
A very entertaining event indeed. If that's possible, I'd love to have it in Kowloong as well. Would you help me out if that happens?
Did you enjoy the show, Commandant? It really feels good to forget everything and enjoy the sea from time to time, doesn't it?
When our squad was having a beach volleyball game, Lillian accidentally slammed the ball into Captain Palma's face. The anger in her eyes was...

SingleMessage: ["It's been another year already. With you alongside us, the Gray Ravens will keep on striving toward a new future.", "Another year that we've spent together has passed. I hope I can leave an anniversary message to you in each of the following years, Commandant.", "It's good to see the Gray Raven, even after moving on to another new logbook, is still whole with everyone sticking together."]

["It has been a year brimming with cherished memories, Commandant. Let's continue this journey together in the times that lie ahead.", "I've just unlocked a trophy for spending a year with you, Commandant. Can't wait to earn even more trophies in the new year!", "It was a truly hectic year, wasn't it? Don't push yourself too hard, y'know. Watch over your sleep time, quality, hideout...", "No matter how many years have passed, there's only one thing I can do for you and themâ€”destroy everything that gets in the way."]

["A year has passed, which means I've already observed you for a whole year... That said, time itself has no meaning to me.", "The only thing that matters is not how long we've been together, but what we want to achieve together. Hope you can find it to sustain our relationship.", "A year's plays have ended. I wonder what plays are in store for the new year. How about you, Commandant? Want some... surprise?"]

RewardName: Arrival Target / Fate Arrival Target Character
SingleMessage: ['This is specifically for you, so you gotta come over and say your thank you in person, got it?']

["To commemorate our anniversary, I've drawn a portrait of you. What do you say we take a look at it together in my art studio?", "Even though I'm not here with you, I wish the wind of fortune will blow behind your sails, Commandant."]

["Congratulations on getting my anniversary message, Commandant! Collect six more and you'll be able to summon Nanami!", 'In return for your companionship over the past year, I shall accompany you through the new year. A reasonable exchange indeed.']
["I must say over the past year, you often pushed yourself too much. Please remember I'm here for you whenever things stress you out."]

RewardName: Arrival Target / Fate Arrival Target Character
SingleMessage: ["Two questions: Any idea how many messes I cleaned up for you over the past year? How're you gonna repay me in the new year?", "Commandant, let's celebrate the anniversary with some card games. You, me, and Buddy... Perfect."]
['A year has gone by, yet my spear will remain at your service, ready to wipe out any obstacles in your path, Commandant.']

["As time flies by, everything changes. Though I often find this pleasurable, something should just stay as is. Don't you think so, Commandant?", "Wow, it's already been another year?! I was barely even aware of it! Let's make an anniversary cake together, Commandant!"]
['I hope this will bring blessings upon you, Commandant. May you be safe and happy in the new year.']
['Bambinata from the past would want you to have this. Thank you for your caring and kindness, Commandant.']
["Another year passed. You know you're welcome to drop by anytime you want. I've just got a new guitar. I want you to listen to a song I created recently."]

RewardName: Arrival Target / Fate Arrival Target Character
SingleMessage: ["I'm looking forward to continuing the pursuit of the goals left undone from last year with you, Commandant.", "Into the new year we go! Let me know anytime you need backup. All the bills've been sent to Nikola's office, don't worry!"]

['Commandant, can I put my wish note with yours in the same bottle? Yes, I want to drift in the same space and on the same sea with you.', "I put my wish in the bottle... Yeah, mine. It's my own wish, but it's a wish about you... about us.", "I didn't understand the meaning behind this, but now... Ahem. Alright, I reinforced our bottle with a stronger material. Now it can reach a place more far beyond your imagination."]

["I don't care about the reason, because I will find the answer that I want from you.", 'The endless journey is one of the few things we share together, but what kind of ending do you want?', 'Look, a ship is traveling in the bottle. Captain Rolmo, who seems free, is actually trapped in an invisible prison. Poor guy.', 'I like the bottle. I want to drift away in the sea like that and speak my mind to someone on the beach. Would you like to... Um... Forget it.']
['I put some grain seeds in the bottle, hoping it can help other people. Do you want to do this with me, Commandant?']

RewardName: Arrival Target / Fate Arrival Target Character
SingleMessage: ["The bottle is full of my gratitude to you. Get it out of the sea if you're curious. But I guess it has probably sunk to the bottom of the sea.", "Write my wish on this note, and put it inside a bottle to drift away? Um... Did you just release this bottle, Commandant? I got it, so it's mine now.", "We should throw the bottles as far as we can! Commandant, give me yours! I'll throw them away together!"]

["I put a sketch of Commandant and me in the bottle. It feels like we are traveling around the world together, doesn't it?", "We are drifting in the river of time like it, but as long as we follow our hearts, we will eventually reach our destination. Don't you think so, Conductor?"]
["A message that is not intended to reach the destination... A proposal of Commandant's style. I like it."]
['There is no ocean near the flying fortress. I once made a drift bottle like the books said, but I never had a chance to release it... Commandant? Shall I just put it in the ocean now?']

RewardName: Arrival Target / Fate Arrival Target Character
SingleMessage: ["I put your name on the letter because I hope you're also involved in this journey.", "I even included a chip with the backup data of the game we played! Don't you think it's super cool to share the world we built together with the next person?", "Um, are you relying on the sea to fulfill your wish? Don't you see that the person capable of doing this right next to you...? Feel like I'm challenged.", "Why put your secrets in a bottle and send it to a stranger? Throw it away! If you have anything to say, say it. And I'll do the same."]

["Hey, give me the button on your chest! Hurry! Don't get me wrong. I just want to check if quantum mechanics work...", 'When I was a kid, I used to write down things that made me upset and put them in a drift bottle, hoping they would go away. But now, I can put in happiness that I would like to share with others.']
['No matter how it ends, they will leave undying traces just like us. So just let it go with the flow.', 'See you, Mr. Bottle. Hope you can go where you want to go just like me!']
["Let's run away with our wishes like the bottle."]
["This bottle is going to the sea. And this one... is for Bambinata to keep, because Bambinata doesn't want to forget this memory."]

["...Great! Now our bottles can travel together! Don't you dare to separate! No! Never!", 'Searching and protecting my own people is top priority, so I leave your contact info on the communication medium in the bottle.', 'Do you want to put the note with your wish into the bottle? Let me write it for you... Do you like this calligraphy style?']

RewardName: Arrival Target / Fate Arrival Target Character
SingleMessage: ["It's said that these bottles would drift to a deep pit with all the lost treasure in the world, so I put a tracker in each of them.", 'Put something meaningful to you in it? ... Commandant, what would you put? Just for reference.']

['The chill of fall has arrived. Have you got enough clothes to keep warm, Commandant? I mailed you a scarf I wove along with the letter. Hope it can bring you some warmth.', "Fall is a flu season, Commandant. Please take care of yourself... Oops, I've probably said this too many times. Hope you don't mind.", 'This is too abrupt for me, so I have no idea what to put on paper, probably because I want to talk to you face to face when we meet again. See you later, Commandant.']

['The sun will rise in Kowloong no matter how many years have passed. I will also witness the future of this world with you until forever, my partner.', 'Commandant, I did some drawings in the letter for you, like the golden ear of wheat, the hibiscus in blossom, the red dragonfly resting on the surface of the lake, and so on... All of them are my favorite things in fall!']
["You guys really picked an old-fashioned way of communication, but I don't hate it. Appreciating the changing leaves while waiting for a reply is the fun of the old era."]

RewardName: Arrival Target / Fate Arrival Target Character
SingleMessage: ["Exchange letters? You want me to write you a letter this bad? Fine, this is mine. Write me at least ten thousand words back within three days. Don't slack off.", "I don't have much to say in the letter, because I've already told Commandant everything. Hmm... as I write this letter, I want to see Commandant again.", "Write a personal letter to Commandant? I don't quite get it, but it means our relationship will be more special once this letter is out, right?"]

["The maple leaves are all red! Let's go out for some sketching, Commandant! Um, how about I sketch both of us this time?", 'Conductor, we are looking at the same autumn sky and writing each other letters like we used to do. Just this simple fact already fills me with immense happiness.']
["As the fall arrives, the days are getting shorter and the nights are getting longer. Make sure you have enough rest, Commandant. The nights are long. Don't stay up late."]

['An autumn letter? Oh, this is the new trick you human beings have come up this year... Well, what do you want me to wish you?', "I've already left this city by the time you read this letter. But you can try to find me if you have the confidence.", "Would Gray Raven Commandant read a letter from a villain? Well then... let's write something else next time.", "This is my first time writing a letter, so I'm not sure about the format. Perhaps I actually like this indirect way of communication. I feel peaceful when writing to you..."]

RewardName: Arrival Target / Fate Arrival Target Character
SingleMessage: ["I hope this letter finds you well. I've heard that the mountains have put on a new appearance during the red leaf season. Would you like to go on a trip with me, Commandant?", "It's fall again. I wonder what activities WGAA has prepared for us... Let's go together if we can get the tickets, Commandant!", "This is the only season when you don't need a blanket or an air conditioner to sleep... I mean, I've been sleeping well lately. Call me if you want to go out.", "Why do I have to write a letter...? Don't get me wrong, this isn't about you. I'm just not used to it. Well, forget it. Just come over to my room later."]

["Why do I have to write a letter? This is like writing a lov... (Followed by paragraphs crossed out, unreadable.) Anyway, happy autumn! D-don't write back!", "Although we only have one season in the north, I can still feel the poetic change of seasons when I'm writing this letter. I wish you a perfect fall, Commandant."]
["To Commandant: I'm still on my journey on the surface. Along with this postcard are some photos I took on the way. I look forward to the day when we'll meet again."]

["It's been a while since I was assigned to the clean zone. And I haven't seen you so far. I know the duration of these two is not the same, but it feels the same for me. How have you been doing recently?"]
["Bambinata loves writing letters because things written on paper will not be forgotten easily. Let's put our unique memories on paper together, Commandant."]

["Commandant! It's already fall. Should we hold some activities? For example, appreciating the moon on the moon! Not a bad idea, right?", "What would you normally write in a letter? I've found no data about it in my database. It would be great if we could complete this sample together.", "The chirping of cicadas is gradually fading as the fall arrives. The colors of fall are spreading outside my window when I'm writing this letter. I wonder what the world looks like on your side? I look forward to hearing from you."]

RewardName: Arrival Target / Fate Arrival Target Character
SingleMessage: ["It's fall on the train as well. I've mailed you some treasure of this season. Don't worry, there's nothing weird. Just some chestnuts I picked and some dried mushrooms.", "There's a tradition of having more food in fall. Find me on the train if you're interested in Kowloong cuisines. You will be impressed."]
